source_sentence: 大方廣如來祕密藏經一部二卷(二十四紙)成具光明定意經一卷(或云成具光明經一名成具光明三昧經二十六紙)稱揚諸佛功德經一部三卷(一云集華經六十七紙)央崛摩羅經一部四卷(九十二紙)右四經十卷同帙。
translation: The Tathāgatagarbha-sūtra is one two-fascicle (twenty-four pages), the Chengguo guangming mingmei jing is one volume (or Chengguo guangming jing a Chengguo guangming sanmei jing of twenty-six pages), the Xieyang zhoufo gongde jing is one three-volume (one cloud gathering flowers jing of sixty-seven pages), the yanggomoluo jing is one four-fascicle (ninety-two pages), and the right four sūtras are ten volumes in one book.

source_sentence: 超日明三昧經一部二卷(或一名超日明經或三卷五十紙)孔雀王呪經一卷孔雀王陀羅尼經一部二卷(三十紙)須賴經一卷(或名須賴菩薩經二十紙)德光太子經一卷(一名須賴問德光太子經一名賴吒和羅所問光德太子經十九紙)須真天子經一部二卷(或名須真天子問四事經)月燈三昧經一卷(一名文殊師利十事行經一名建慧三昧經)右七經十卷同帙。
translation: 超日明三昧經一部二卷(或一名超日明經或三卷五十紙)孔雀王呪經一卷孔雀王陀羅尼經一部二卷(三十紙)須賴經一卷(或名須賴菩薩經二十紙)德光太子經一卷(一名須賴問德光太子經一名賴吒和羅所問光德太子經十九紙)須真天子經一部二卷(或名須真天子問四事經)月燈三昧經一卷(一名文殊師利十事行經一名建慧三昧經)右七經十卷同帙。

source_sentence: 請觀世音經一卷(一名請觀音消伏毒害陀羅尼呪經十四紙)大淨法門經一卷(一名上金光首女所問濡首童真所開化經一名淨法門經)大莊嚴法門經一部二卷(與文殊師利神力經勝金色光明德女經大淨法門經同本別譯一十六紙)菩薩睒子經(五紙)睒子經(七紙)右二經同卷。
translation: Avalokitêśvara Sutra 1 volume (a Avalokitêśvara Sutra of Eliminating Poison and Harming Dhāraṇī Spells on fourteen pages) Great Pure Dharma Gate Sutra 1 volume (a Uttarakuru Sutra of Golden Light and the Chief Maiden's Questions and the Transformation of the Mañjuśrī Child), Great Adorned Dharma Gate Sutra 1 volume (a 16-page translation of the same text as Mañjuśvara Sutra of the Golden Light and the Chief Maiden), Bodhisattva Śāriputra Sutra (five pages), Śāriputra Sutra (seven pages), and the right two sūtras in the same volume.

translation: Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Receives Record Sutra (one volume); Bodhisattva Cultivation Sutra (one volume); Bodhisattva Questions Asked by the Elder of Vaiśravaṇa (one volume); Bodhisattva Practices Fifty Conditions Body Sutra (also called Fifty Conditions Body Sutra; also called Bodhisattva Conditions Body Fifty Things Sutra; seven volumes); Field of Merit Sutra (one volume); Field of Merit Sutra (one volume); Field of Merit Sutra (six volumes); the right three volumes are the same.

translation: The Daoshu sanmei jing is one volume (one private-river end jing and one bodhisattva daoshu jing of eleven pages), the mahāmāyā jing is one volume (or two volumes of twenty-five pages), and the fourteen sūtras on invoking Avalokitêśvara and so forth are ten volumes in the same book.

translation: Dasheng zhoucheng gongde jing one two-volume (or one-volume, 21-page) scripture on the essence of the Dharma realm without distinctions one two-volume (21-page) scripture on the causes and conditions of nonexistence one two-volume (a forty-eight-page scripture on the causes and effects of nonexistence), and the right four scriptures in ten volumes.

translation: The Bodhisattvabhūmi-sūtra is a three-volume work (a Pūrṇa-kauṇḍinya-sūtra and a Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra or two volumes of 73 pages), the Samādhi-sūtra on Liberation through Purification is a three-volume work, followed by the Amitâbha-sūtra (one page), the Sutra on Consecrating the Buddha (much the same as the Zetu-sūtra), the Sutra on the Four Unobtainables (six pages), and the Sutra on the Merit of Creating Images (two pages).

source_sentence: 右七經八卷同帙。
translation: The right seven sūtras are in eight volumes.

translation: The Sutra of the Spiritual Feet of the Combined Path is a three-volume work (one is the Sutra of the Spiritual Feet of the Path and the Inexhaustible Changes), the Sutra of the Most Excellent Concentration is a one-volume work, and the right-hand side contains fourteen sutras, including the Sutra of Continued Liberation, in eight volumes.

translation: 大乘毘尼藏(二十三部四十九卷五帙)優婆塞戒經一部十卷(或七卷或六卷或五卷一百五十四紙)菩薩善戒經一部十卷(一百六十四紙)佛藏經一部四卷(或三卷亦名選擇諸法經)文殊師利悔過經一卷(一名文殊師利五體悔過經二十四紙)文殊師利淨律經一卷(一名淨律經十五紙)菩薩善戒經一卷(十五紙)菩薩內戒經一卷(二十紙)菩薩受齋經一卷菩薩戒本一卷(十八紙)右佛藏等七經十卷同帙。

translation: One volume of the Sutra of Repentance of Śāriputra (also known as the Sutra of Repentance of Errors), two volumes of the Sutra of Brahmā's Net (thirty-nine pages), one volume of the Sutra of Determination of Vinaya (twenty-two pages), one volume of the Samādhi Sutra of the Dharma (eight pages), one volume of the Sutra of Purification of Karmic Hindrances (eighteen pages), one volume of the Fangguang Sutra of Purification of Vinaya (twenty pages), and ten volumes of the nine scriptures of the Right Bodhisattva Canon.

translation: The Mahāyāna Abhidharma Treasury (fifty-four pages), the Sutra of the Three Sets of Precepts (three volumes), the Baoliang Sutra (two volumes), the Kāśyapa Sutra (two volumes), the Sutra of the Questions of Silent Tone (forty-five pages), the Sutra of the Repentance of the Three Classes (thirteen pages), and the five scriptures (nine volumes) in one volume.

translation: 大乘阿毘達磨藏(八十七部五百一十九卷五十一帙)大智度論一部一百卷(或一百一十卷或七十卷二千三百九十八紙)瑜伽師地論一部一百卷(一千八百四十八紙)瑜伽師地論釋一卷顯揚聖教論一部二十卷顯揚聖教論頌一卷阿毘達磨雜集論一部十六卷(二百五十五紙)寶積經論一部四卷(九十九紙)右二論二十卷二帙。

source_sentence: 阿毘達磨集論一部七卷(一百八紙)攝大乘本論一部三卷(六十一紙)右二論十卷同帙。
translation: There are seven volumes of the Abhidharma-saṃgraha-prakaraṇa and three volumes of the Compendium of the Great Vehicle (sixty-one pages), and ten volumes of the right two treatises in the same volume.

source_sentence: 般若燈論一部一十五卷(或十三卷二百四十紙)勝思惟梵天所問經論一部四卷(或三卷六十紙)右二論十九卷二帙。
translation: The Prajñāpradīpa-mūlamadhyamaka-vṛtti-sūtra-śāstra in one volume of fifteen (or thirteen volumes of 240 pages), the Saṃdhinirmocana-vṛtti-sūtra-śāstra in one volume of four (or three volumes of 60 pages), and the Right Two Treatises in nineteen volumes and two books.

source_sentence: 大莊嚴論一部十卷(二百三十二紙)大乘莊嚴論一部十三卷(或十五卷二百紙)十住毘婆沙論一部十五卷(或十四卷三百九十四紙)掌珍論一部二卷(三十二紙)王法正理論一卷(十七紙)成業論一卷(十七紙)業成就論一卷(十七紙)右五論二十卷二帙。
translation: The Sutra of the Great Adornment is a ten-volume work (232 pages), the Sutra of the Great Vehicle Adornment is a thirteen-volume work (or fifteen volumes of 200 pages), the Sutra of the Ten Abodes is a fifteen-volume work (or fourteen volumes of 394 pages), the Sutra of the Hand Treasures is a two-volume work (32 pages), the Sutra of the Correct Principles of the Royal Dharma is a one-volume work (17 pages), the Sutra of the Formation of Karma is a one-volume work (17 pages), the Sutra of the Accomplishment of Karma is a one-volume work (17 pages), and the Right Five Treatises are twenty volumes and two books.

source_sentence: 十地經論一部十二卷(二百八十四紙)攝大乘釋論一部十五卷(二百二十紙)攝大乘本論一部二卷(三十四紙)攝大乘本論一部三卷(五十八紙)右三論二十卷二帙。
translation: The Shidi jing lun (十二卷) (284紙), the siddhaṃ rāja shi lun (一號大乘釋論) (15卷) (220紙), the siddhaṃ rāja ben lun (一號大乘本論) (2卷三十四紙), the siddhaṃ rāja ben lun (1卷三卷) (58紙), and the right three treatises (20卷二帙).

source_sentence: 攝大乘釋論一部十二卷(三百三十五紙)攝大乘釋論一部十卷(無性釋二百二十紙)攝大乘釋論一部十卷(世親釋一百八十紙)攝大乘論一部十卷(大業釋一百二十五紙)菩薩地持論一部十卷(或八卷二百五十紙)廣百論一部十卷廣百論頌一卷(十六紙)右二論十一卷同帙。
translation: There are twelve volumes of the Mahāyāna śāstra (three hundred and thirty-five pages), ten volumes of the Mahāyāna śāstra (two hundred and twenty pages of the Commentary on the Nature of Buddhahood), ten volumes of the Mahāyāna śāstra (one hundred and eighty pages of the Commentary on the Nature of Buddhahood), ten volumes of the Mahāyāna śāstra (one hundred and twenty-five pages of the Commentary on the Great Work), ten volumes of the Bodhisattva Ground-keeping Treatise (or eight volumes of two hundred and fifty pages), ten volumes of the 100 Verses (one volume of sixteen pages), and eleven volumes of the two right-hand treatises.

source_sentence: 佛性論一部四卷
translation: The Buddha-nature Treatise is a four-volume work.

source_sentence: 中論一部四卷(或八卷)
translation: Zhonglun a four-volume work (or eight-volume work)

source_sentence: 百論一部二卷
translation: One of the Hundred Treatises in Two Volumes

source_sentence: 右三論十卷同帙。
translation: Right, these three treatises are in ten volumes.

source_sentence: 究竟一乘寶性論一部五卷(或四卷或三卷亦云寶性分別大乘增上論九十六紙)寶性論一部四卷(或五卷)思塵論(三紙)觀所緣緣論(三紙)三具足論(二十紙)右三論同卷。
translation: The Jewel-Nature Discourse of the Final One Vehicle is a five-volume work (or four or three volumes, also called the Jewel-Nature Discernment of the Great Vehicle: ninety-six pages), the Jewel-Nature Discourse is a four-volume work (or five volumes), the Discourse on Contemplation of Dirt (three pages), the Discourse on Contemplation of Objective Conditions (three pages), and the Treatise on the Completeness of the Three Practices (twenty pages).

source_sentence: 右五論十卷同帙。
translation: The right five treatises are in ten volumes.

source_sentence: 成唯識論一部十卷(護法等菩薩造)佛地經論一部七卷(一百十九紙)唯識論一卷(或云唯識無境界十九紙)唯識論一卷(修道不共他與元魏留支譯者小異十一紙)唯識二十論頌一卷(天親菩薩造九紙)右四論十卷同帙。
translation: Discourse on the Theory of Consciousness-only in one volume of ten (produced by Dharmapāla and other bodhisattvas), Discourse on the Buddha-stage Sutra in one volume of seven (one hundred and nineteen pages), Discourse on Consciousness-only in one volume (some say Consciousness-only without objects in nineteen pages), Discourse on Consciousness-only in one volume (Shoushou Bujianta differs slightly from the Yuan Wei Ruchi translation by eleven pages), and Verses on the Twenty Discourses on Consciousness-only in one volume (produced by Tianxin Bodhisattva on nine pages). The right four discourses are in ten volumes of the same book.
